detailview1: Grow your business on platforms like Amazon, Etsy, and Shopify with our cost-effective Dropshipping Solutions and Online Trainings.
detailview2: Our Amazon solutions offer comprehensive strategies designed to grow your business and increase efficiency.
detailview6: Our e-commerce solutions provide comprehensive and innovative strategies to enhance the performance of your online store and perfect the customer experience.
detailview4: Our overseas company formation and accounting support solutions offer strategies specifically designed to optimize your business processes and provide a competitive advantage.
detailview8: In our Dropshipping trainings, we provide in-depth content on Etsy, Shopify, and Amazon platforms. Learn how to succeed in marketplaces. Take your first step into e-commerce by scheduling a consultation!
topicsub: Obserway is an innovative management platform that elevates your dropshipping business to the next level. With advanced integration features, comprehensive analysis tools, and automated shipping management, it simplifies your e-commerce operations. With international shipping options and a user-friendly interface, Obserway helps you succeed in global markets. Manage your business more efficiently and profitably with Obserway.
card2: We provide the best pricing option for your shipment and budget from the service options we offer.
card4: Provides affordable international shipping options for buyers in various countries, making it easier for sellers to compete in the global market.
card5: Pay Online and Track Your Shipment
card6: Integrate your store on global marketplaces into the panel. Get shipping quotes as soon as your order arrives and automate your shipping processes.
card7: Pay Online and Track Your Shipment
shippingpartsub: Take advantage of the transportation services and special deals from the dozens of international and domestic shipping companies we are partnered with.
shippingpartsub2: Special offers available only on Obserway.
pricecomp1: Let us find the best price for you.
pricecomp2: Please click on the section you want to process and enter the details.
address2: Adalet Neighborhood, Folkart Towers, No: 39, Internal Door No: 3103
aboutuscontext: We are a rapidly growing warehouse network provider worldwide. With strategic partnerships across 10 different warehouses throughout the USA, we offer the most suitable and fastest logistics solutions for businesses and entrepreneurs.
aboutuscontext2: Our mission is to support the success and growth of businesses. We provide an ideal solution for those who want to dropship on e-commerce platforms like Amazon, ensuring businesses can deliver products to their customers quickly, affordably, and reliably.
aboutuscontext3: Each of our specialized warehouses is equipped to provide the highest standards in logistics operations such as storage, packaging, and shipping. We offer flexible and customized storage solutions to meet the demands of our clients.
aboutuscontext4: Our team continuously works to improve our services and maintain the highest level of customer satisfaction by keeping up with innovations in the industry. We aim not only to provide storage services but also to help our clients grow their businesses by offering solutions that contribute to their success.
aboutuscontext5: At OBSERWAY, we take pride in offering reliable, flexible, and innovative solutions to meet the logistics needs of businesses. Join us to contribute to the growth of your business.
Answer1: We have 10 different warehouses across the United States, each located in various regions, providing our customers with a wide geographic coverage.
Answer2: Delivery times may vary depending on the warehouse location and the delivery address. Our standard delivery times are between 3 to 7 business days.
Answer3: Shipping costs vary based on the warehouse you select, the weight of the product, and the delivery address. You can use the QUICK PRICE tool on our website to find out your shipping costs.
Question4: What types of products can I use your warehouses for?
Answer4: Our contracted warehouses are designed to store a variety of product types. You can quickly and cost-effectively ship a wide range of products from over 30 categories from our warehouses.
Question5: How can I process product returns?
Answer5: Our return policies may vary depending on the product condition and the warehouse provider. If the product is with your customers, simply provide them with the return label and the warehouse address we give you. If the product is in our warehouses, you need to upload the DROP OFF return label to the system. Don't forget to contact us first.
Question6: Do I need a membership to use your website?
Answer6: No, you do not need to be a member to use our website. However, to benefit from our warehouses and track your shipments, you must create an account.
Answer7: Yes, Obserway is completely free. However, to access cheaper shipping options and take advantage of the privileges we offer, you must create a SUBSCRIPTION.
Answer8: Users with a subscription package benefit from additional discounts and various privileges depending on the package purchased.
Question9: How is the shipping fee calculated?
Answer9: For your Amazon dropshipping shipments, simply select the relevant e-commerce platform from the QUICK PRICE section and enter the requested information. Obserway will offer you the best price.
Question10: How is the shipping fee for Shopify and Etsy calculated?
Answer10: For your Shopify and Etsy shipments, simply select the relevant e-commerce platform from the QUICK PRICE section and enter the requested information.
Question11: What happens if packages are lost?
Answer11: In the event that products cannot be delivered for any reason, after the necessary investigations, Obserway will refund the amount to your account following the policies of the bank you used.
Answer12: You can top up your balance using Payoneer, Wise, credit, and debit cards.
Question13: Can I transfer or withdraw the balance I uploaded?
Answer13: According to our policies, uploaded balances cannot be withdrawn but can be transferred to another user.
Question14: How can I benefit from the free dropshipping training?
Answer14: You can access all the information and schedule a free 30-minute dropshipping training session with our expert trainers by clicking on the 'free dropshipping training' page under the OUR SERVICES section on our website.
Answer15: Especially in the Mexican marketplace, you will not encounter any customs issues. Your products will be delivered to the delivery address without any customs problems. We also recommend reviewing the customs policies of the relevant countries.
Answer16: Obserway will eliminate your need to search for an intermediary warehouse by reviewing all the offers from 10 different intermediary warehouses in real-time and providing you with the most suitable price. Thus, it will save you both time and money.
Question17: How can I track my shipment?
Answer17: In your panel, under the 'My Shipments' section, you can learn the details and track your order in real-time after it arrives at our warehouses.
apc2: Enter the ASIN code and ZIP code to quickly and accurately find shipping costs for your Amazon dropshipping operations.
calculatordescription: For Amazon dropshipping, enter the ASIN code of the product you wish to send and the ZIP code of the destination. No weight information is required. After providing this information, specify your service preference. Based on these details, our system will automatically calculate shipping costs and present you with the most cost-effective options instantly. This service helps you manage your Amazon dropshipping business efficiently and avoid unexpected shipping costs.
calculatortitle: How do we calculate the best shipping price for Amazon?
subtitle: Note: Our shipping prices will be updated based on measurements made at our warehouse.
etsydesc: After filling in the necessary dimensions for Etsy Dropshipping, take advantage of the best price options.
etsycalculatordescription: For Etsy dropshipping, you need to provide certain essential details when listing your products on the platform. First, you need to specify the physical characteristics of your products, such as weight, length, and width. This information is essential to calculate accurate shipping fees for your customers and to ensure that your products are prepared for potential issues during transit.
etsycalculatortitle: How do we calculate the best shipping price for Etsy?
shopifytitle: How do we calculate the best shipping price for Shopify?
shopifycalculatordescription: For Shopify dropshipping, you need to provide certain essential details when listing your products on the platform. First, you need to specify the physical characteristics of your products, such as weight, length, and width. This information is essential to calculate accurate shipping fees for your customers and to ensure that your products are prepared for potential issues during transit.
shopifydesc: After filling in the necessary dimensions for Shopify Dropshipping, take advantage of the best price options.

systemDescription: Using this system, you can compare shipping rates from different platforms. Enter your details, select the platform, and click 'Compare Prices' to find the best shipping option.
detailviewsubtitle: We provide solutions tailored to every industry. Explore the details.
description1: At Obserway, we offer profit-sharing to investors with a specific capital while taking full responsibility for managing the e-commerce store. This solution allows investors to earn income without risking their capital, while we handle all strategic and operational processes to effectively manage the store and increase profitability.
description2: Features of the Obserway E-Commerce Solution:
feature1: Capital and Investor Management: Investors receive regular profit sharing based on their capital, without being involved in store management.
feature2: Full Management Responsibility: We take full responsibility for managing the store.
feature3: Product and Inventory Management: Selecting the most profitable products and managing stock levels effectively.
feature4: Marketing and Sales Strategies: Digital marketing strategies are implemented to increase store visibility.
feature5: Profit Sharing: Profit is shared with investors based on pre-agreed rates if the store is profitable.
feature6: Risk Management: Necessary precautions are taken to protect investor capital.
loading_message: Please wait, payment is being processed...

amazonFundRecoveryService.description: Our Amazon Fund Recovery Service helps recover lost or mistakenly spent funds. Our professional team manages the complex procedures and provides the fastest solution.
amazonFundRecoveryService.feature2: One-on-one support with our expert team

amazonFeedbackService.title: Amazon Account Feedback Service
amazonFeedbackService.description: Our Amazon Account Feedback Service collects and evaluates feedback related to your account. Our services help you improve user experience and enhance your performance on Amazon.

educatesubtitle: Explore our various online training programs to enhance your skills.
amazonDropshippingDesc: Learn the intricacies of Amazon dropshipping, including product sourcing, listing, and marketing strategies.
amazonPrivateLabelDesc: Understand how to create and market your own brand on Amazon with our comprehensive training.
onlineArbitrageDesc: Explore online arbitrage techniques and find profitable products to resell on various platforms.

wholesaleDesc: Learn the art of buying and selling wholesale and scale your business efficiently.
ebayDesc: Learn eBay selling strategies and master everything from product listing to sales management.

cookieBanner.message: We use cookies to enhance your experience, personalize content, and provide tailored marketing. You can accept all cookies or manage your preferences for essential cookies and others by clicking the 'Manage Cookies' button.

cookieManagement.manageDescription: We use cookies to improve your experience, analyze usage, and offer personalized content. You can choose which cookies you want to allow.

cookieCategories.essentialDescription: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be disabled.
cookieCategories.analyticsDescription: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our site, allowing us to improve user experience.
cookieCategories.marketingDescription: These cookies help provide personalized ads and marketing based on your browsing behavior.
